name: Blade-Bound
summary: A sentient blade guides your sworn quest.

abilities.text: Your blade speaks in moments of need. When you Secure an Advantage by listening to its counsel, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you Strike or Clash alongside the blade's urging, mark a checkbox to add +1 harm.
When you Fulfill Your Vow tied to the blade's purpose, take +2 momentum.

name: Hawk
summary: A keen-eyed raptor aids your travels.

abilities.text: When your hawk scouts ahead to Gather Information, take +1. On a hit, take +1 momentum.
When your hawk distracts a foe and you Strike at range, inflict +1 harm.
When your hawk delivers a small object or message, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

name: Skirmisher
summary: You fight on the move with reach weapons or spears.

abilities.text: When you Face Danger or Secure an Advantage by keeping your distance, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you Strike or Clash after repositioning, inflict +1 harm.
When you Turn the Tide, take +1 momentum and add +1 to your next move.

name: Augury
summary: You read omens in the bones, runes, or flame.

abilities.text: When you perform an augury, roll +wits. On a hit, ask the oracle a single open-ended question about your path forward.
When you Aid an Ally after performing an augury for them, take +1 on your Secure an Advantage.
When you read omens for a coming battle, take +1 momentum now and +1 on your first Strike or Clash.
